idea: A short horror video about a person who finds an old, unplugged radio that starts talking

expanded_idea.theme: The dangers of unseen forces and the unsettling nature of the past resurfacing.

characters.name: Sarah
characters.description: A curious and slightly reckless young woman who discovers the radio.

characters.name: The Radio Voice
characters.description: A disembodied, malevolent entity communicating through the radio.

expanded_idea.cinematic_summary: Sarah finds an antique radio in her attic. Despite it being unplugged, it crackles to life, emitting a distorted voice that seems to know her name and darkest fears. The voice grows increasingly threatening, culminating in a visual manifestation of its power through the radio's speaker, ending with Sarah screaming as the screen cuts to black.

script.title: Static Terror
script.logline: A young woman unleashes a malevolent entity when she discovers an antique radio in her attic that knows her deepest fears.

scenes.action: SARAH (20s), dusts off an old antique radio in a dimly lit attic. Cobwebs hang everywhere. She plugs it in, but nothing happens.
Sarah is about to give up and turns to leave when the radio crackles to life. Static fills the air, then a distorted VOICE emerges.
Close-up on Sarah's face, a mixture of fear and morbid curiosity. She slowly approaches the radio again.
Sarah hesitates, then responds cautiously. The radio VOICE intensifies, becoming more menacing.

dialogue.line: Who is this? How do you know my name?
I know everything, Sarah. Your fears, your secrets...

scenes.action: The radio begins to shake violently. The VOICE is now a guttural growl. The speaker bulges outward, a dark shape forming within.

dialogue.line: You can't escape me, Sarah. I'm already inside...

scenes.action: Sarah screams as the dark shape bursts from the speaker. Quick cut to black.
